title: List reservations
description: Lists all BigQuery reservations within a specified project and location.

objective.narrative: This sample helps an administrator or capacity planner see all active BigQuery reservations in a specific project and location. This is a common first step before performing management tasks like updating capacity, moving projects between reservations, or auditing slot usage.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservations_list
regionTags.title: List reservations
regionTags.description: Lists all BigQuery reservations within a specified project and location.
